title_give_quantity: Set the number of inventory items to be issued:

error_was_added: has already been added to the inventory list

error_get_item: To carry out the operation, first, receive this inventory item.
error_not_marked: Inventory item has not been marked

error_internet: Connection error. Check the internet connection
ident_help: Scan the QR code of the inventory item and get detailed information about it.
mark_help: Mark a new inventory item or re-mark an inventory item with a lost or damaged QR code.
invent_help: Just scan the QR code of the inventory item, the inventory report will be in the Administrative Panel.
accept_help: Accept the inventory item in your report or transfer it to another employee.
service_help: Send the inventory items to or make a return from the service.
write_off_help: Scan the QR code of the inventory items if its further operation is not possible and it is subject to write-off.
my_account: View the inventory items assigned to you.
not_now: Limits has been exceeded. You can send a password reset request only once a minute
sucess_reset_pass: We have successfully sent a link to reset your password
entry_email: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password
popup_limit_exceeded_body_worker: Inventory item quantity limit for your company has been exceeded. Contact the administrators or storekeepers of the group to change the tariff plan
popup_limit_exceeded_body_admin: Inventory item quantity limit for your company has been exceeded. Change the tariff plan for further work in EqMan.
delete_confirm: Do you really want to remove the selected inventory items from the request?
delete_transfer_confirm: Do you really want to delete the selected request?
auto_accept_transfer: Request has been created. Attention! 'No confirmation' mode is enabled, which means that upon creating a request, the employee will not be required to confirm it upon receipt. To enable confirmation, go to the 'Settings' tab in the Administrative Panel and enable 'Confirmation mode'.

enter_valid: Enter email or confirmed phone number as +38 0XX 111 1111
inList: Inventory item is already on the list
no_acesss: You don't have the rights to this inventory item
inComplect: The inventory item has already been set up
do_not_apply: do not apply to this request
operation_mark: Inventory item has been marked with a QR code
moved_manually: moved this inventory item without confirmation to

operation_remove_from_transfer_complete: refused acceptance of the inventory item

error_has_mounted_items: Inventory item must not have mounted parts
error_has_already_mounted: This inventory item has already been chosen
